name: CryptococcosisTestsForCryptococcusSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Cryptococcosis (Tests for Cryptococcus species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names to detect nucleic acids of Cryptococcus species),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: Cryptococcus species),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
